orinoco
Interface TextWriter

All Known Subinterfaces:
LayoutWriter
All Known Implementing Classes:
orinoco.layout.BaseWriter, Document
public interface TextWriter

The basic interface for writing text to a document

Method Summary
 void setFont(Font f)
          Writes all data in this font until the font is set to something else.
 void write(java.lang.String s)
          Writes the string at the current position to the document, but without new line
 void write(java.lang.String s, Font f)
          Writes just the text passed in with the specified font
 void writeLine(java.lang.String s)
          Writes the string specified on a new line
 void writeLine(java.lang.String s, Alignment a)
          Writes the following line with the specified alignment on a new line
 void writeLine(java.lang.String s, Font f)
          Writes just the text passed in on a new line in the specified font
 void writeLine(java.lang.String s, Font f, Alignment a)
          Writes the following lines with the specified alignment on a new line
 void writeMacro(TextMacro tm)
          Adds the text macro to the current line
 void writeMacro(TextMacro tm, Font f)
          Writes the text macro on its own line
 void writeMacroLine(TextMacro tm, Font f, Alignment a)
          Writes the text macro in the specified font with the specified alignment on a new line
